programmes.show_description: Join AALL & Create and tune in for fabulous demos and amazing deals - a crafty hour awaits with new stamps, dies, stencils, washi tape and more.
Hunkydory's much loved Little Books have become an essential for crafters! Each Little Book comes with atleast 144 pages of imagery on a high quality 150gsm paper.
Tune in for Takeover Reloaded Deals, bringing you a selection of top offers and exclusive savings, giving you the chance to get more value on crafty products before time runs out!
Join us for the Elegant Embossing Show featuring Tim Holtz Embossing Folders, Stacey's Diffuser Embossing, the Beautiful Botanicals Embossing Bundle, and more.
Join AALL & Create and tune in for fabulous demos and amazing deals - a crafty hour awaits with new stamps, dies, stencils, washi tape and more.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
Join Adam Brooks for an extra hour of Sewing Street as the Birthday celebrations continue!
Sarah Patterson is bringing beautiful brand new fabrics in all compositions!
Janet Clare will be bringing us the brand new Edith Quilt, High Tea Quilt, FQ bundles and have some amazing deals on instructions.
Sarah Patterson is bringing beautiful brand new fabrics in all compositions!
David Green is back on Sewing Street, with an hour and a half of the fantastic Green Machine!
Tune in to discover this multi-award-winning, family-run craft company! Explore their latest collection of stunning stamps, papers, embellishments, and creative stamp sets.
Christine is back with another fantastic show featuring brand-new products - bringing you fresh ideas and must-have supplies to elevate your next crafting project.
Tune in for an exciting collection of co-ordinating papers from Tim holtz featuring the Palette Collection - rich, aged, and bursting with character.

Christine Bell brings some fantastic Pinflair kits including an exclusive Sewing Street project.
Discover essential tools designed to help you measure, cut, mark, and perfect your fabrics with ease - the must-haves for every sewing and quilting project.
Join us for another hour of Pinflair kits with Christine Bell.
Don't miss these birthday deals on Elna machines!
